verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-and שׁוּשַׁ֣ן shu-Shan עֵד֑וּת <S%H7802><s%> 'e-Dut; upon Shushaneduth מִכְתָּ֖ם <S%H4387><s%> mich-Tam Michtam לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid of David לְלַמֵּֽד׃ <S%H3925><s%> le-lam-Med. to teach בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ׀ <S%H5327><s%> be-hatz-tzo-To when he strove אֶ֥ת <S%H854><s%> 'et for אֲרַ֣ם 'a-Ram נַהֲרַיִם֮ <S%H763><s%> na-ha-ra-Yim Aham-naharaim וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> ve-'Et for אֲרַ֪ם 'a-Ram צ֫וֹבָ֥ה <S%H760><s%> tzo-Vah and with Aramzobah וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov returned יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> yo-'Av, when Joab וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <S%H1516><s%> be-gei- in the valley מֶ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> Me-lach; of salt שְׁנֵ֖ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ <S%H2186><s%> ze-nach-Ta-nu thou hast cast us off פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H6555><s%> fe-ratz-Ta-nu; thou hast scattered אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ <S%H599><s%> 'a-Naf-ta, us thou hast been displeased תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> te-Sho-Vev O turn thyself to us again לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה <S%H7493><s%> hir-'Ash-tah to tremble אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz Thou hast made the earth פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ <S%H6480><s%> pe-tzam-Tah; thou hast broken רְפָ֖ה <S%H7495><s%> re-Fah it heal שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ <S%H7667><s%> she-va-Rei-ha the breaches כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- for מָֽטָה׃ <S%H4131><s%> Ma-tah. thereof for it shaketh

הִרְאִ֣יתָה <S%H7200><s%> hir-'I-tah Thou hast shewed עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha thy people קָשָׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah; hard things הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ <S%H8248><s%> hish-ki-Ta-nu, thou hast made us to drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin the wine תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃ <S%H8653><s%> tar-'e-Lah. of astonishment

נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah Thou hast given לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ <S%H3373><s%> li-re-'Ei-cha to them that fear נֵּ֭ס <S%H5251><s%> nes a banner לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס <S%H5127><s%> le-hit-no-Ses; thee that it may be displayed מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei, because קֹ֣שֶׁט <S%H7189><s%> Ko-shet of the truth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> Le-ma-'an because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <S%H2502><s%> ye-chal-Tzun may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <S%H3039><s%> ye-di-Dei-cha; That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <S%H3467><s%> ho-Shi-'ah save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha [with] thy right hand; וַעֲנֵנוּ va-'a-ne-nu כוַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6032><s%> va-'a-Ne-ni. answer ק

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> be-ka-de-Sho, in his holiness אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה <S%H5937><s%> 'e'-Lo-zah I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <S%H2505><s%> 'a-chal-le-Kah I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem; Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> ve-'E-mek the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <S%H4058><s%> 'a-mad-Ded. and mete out

לִ֤י li גִלְעָ֨ד׀ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad Gilead וְלִ֬י ve-Li מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, [is] mine and Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> Ve-'ef-ra-yim [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> ma-'oz also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi; of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, Judah מְחֹֽקְקִי׃ <S%H2710><s%> me-Cho-ke-ki. [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב׀ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av Moab סִ֬יר <S%H5518><s%> sir caldron רַחְצִ֗י <S%H7366><s%> rach-Tzi, is My washbowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Over אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> 'E-dom over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> 'ash-Lich will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <S%H5275><s%> na-'a-Li; my shoe עָ֝לַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, because פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> pe-Le-shet Philistia הִתְרֹעָֽעִֽי׃ <S%H7321><s%> hit-ro-'A-'I. triumph

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <S%H2986><s%> Yoi-le-ni Who will bring עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir Ai מָצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> ma-Tzor; me [into] the strong מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who נָחַ֣נִי <S%H5148><s%> na-Cha-ni will lead עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> e-Dom. Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ha-lo- not אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah Yourself אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [Wilt] not thou O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H2186><s%> ze-nach-Ta-nu; [which] hadst cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze [which] didst not go out אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, ;and [thou] O God בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. our armies

הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עֶזְרָ֣ת <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-Rat us help מִצָּ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> mitz-Tzar; from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <S%H7723><s%> ve-Shav, for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'At [is] the help אָדָם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-dam of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-seh- we shall do חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu, who יָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> ya-Vus for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rei-nu. our enemies
